programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Arts And Culture, Musical, Drama ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic, starring Angourie Rice, Renee Rapp, Auli'i Cravalho, and Tina Fey, who also wrote the screenplay Samantha Jayne - Director Arturo Perez Jr - Director Angourie Rice - Cady Heron Reneé Rapp - Regina George Auli'i Cravalho - Janis 'Imi'ike Avantika - Karen Shetty Bebe Wood - Gretchen Wieners Christopher Briney - Aaron Samuels Jaquel Spivey - Damian Hubbard Tina Fey - Sharon Norbury Tim Meadows - Principal Ron Duvall Jenna Fischer - Ms Heron Busy Philipps - Mrs George Ashley Park - Madame Park Jon Hamm - Coach Carr Angourie Rice - Cady Heron Reneé Rapp - Regina George Auli'i Cravalho - Janis 'Imi'ike Avantika - Karen Shetty Bebe Wood - Gretchen Wieners Christopher Briney - Aaron Samuels Jaquel Spivey - Damian Hubbard Tina Fey - Sharon Norbury Tim Meadows - Principal Ron Duvall Jenna Fischer - Ms Heron Busy Philipps - Mrs George Ashley Park - Madame Park Jon Hamm - Coach Carr.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Arts And Culture, Musical, Sitcom, Music, Drama ║ 2016 ║ 15
programme.desc: Comedy starring Ricky Gervais. Thirteen years after being the subject of reality TV series The Office, David Brent now works as a salesman of cleaning supplies. However, his dream of becoming a rock star remains. So when Brent decides to reform his old group Foregone Conclusion, only with all-new members, a documentary crew once again follows the man and his band as they embark on a three-week tour Ricky Gervais - Director Ricky Gervais - David Brent Ben Bailey Smith - Dom Johnson Tom Basden - Dan Harvey Tom Bennett - Nigel Martin Jo Hartley - Pauline Gray Andy Burrows - Drummer Rebecca Gethings - Miriam Andrew Brooke - Jerry \Jezza\ Collins Mandeep Dhillon - Karen Parashar Abbie Murphy - Serena Wilson Nina Sosanya - Dr Vivienne Keating Diane Morgan - Briony Jones Kevin Bishop - DJ Ricky Gervais - David Brent Ben Bailey Smith - Dom Johnson Tom Basden - Dan Harvey Tom Bennett - Nigel Martin Jo Hartley - Pauline Gray Andy Burrows - Drummer Rebecca Gethings - Miriam Andrew Brooke - Jerry \Jezza\ Collins Mandeep Dhillon - Karen Parashar Abbie Murphy - Serena Wilson Nina Sosanya - Dr Vivienne Keating Diane Morgan - Briony Jones Kevin Bishop - DJ.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Comedy starring Vince Vaughn, Jason Bateman and Jon Favreau. In an attempt to save their rocky marriage Jason and Cynthia enrol in a course of therapy sessions at a tropical resort and invite their friends along for moral support. programme.title: The Unlikely Pilgrimage of Harold Fry
programme.desc: Devon-based pensioner Harold Fry receives a letter from his dying former work colleague, Queenie. She is living out her final few days in a Northumberland hospice. Harold spontaneously embarks on a physically gruelling 500-mile trek north. Drama, starring Jim Broadbent and Penelope Wilton Hettie Macdonald - Director Jim Broadbent - Harold Fry Penelope Wilton - Maureen Fry Earl Cave - David Fry Linda Bassett - Queenie Monika Gossmann - Martina Claire Rushbrook - Farmer's wife Jim Broadbent - Harold Fry Penelope Wilton - Maureen Fry Earl Cave - David Fry Linda Bassett - Queenie Monika Gossmann - Martina Claire Rushbrook - Farmer's wife.

programme.title: Am I OK?

programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. Trapped in a cycle of time jumps, Teddy is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him. With the help of his best friend Sam, Teddy tries to piece together where it all went wrong and, as his life flashes before his eyes, he must learn how to live life in the precious moments to win back the woman he loves. Romantic comedy, starring Rafe Spall and Zahra Newman Josh Lawson - Director Rafe Spall - Teddy Zahra Newman - Leanne Ronny Chieng - Sam Dena Kaplan - Becka Noni Hazlehurst - The stranger Josh Lawson - Patrick Rafe Spall - Teddy Zahra Newman - Leanne Ronny Chieng - Sam Dena Kaplan - Becka Noni Hazlehurst - The stranger Josh Lawson - Patrick.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Reese Witherspoon and Mark Ruffalo. After a fatal road accident, workaholic doctor Elizabeth Masterson wakes up in her own San Francisco apartment as a ghost, and resents the presence of its troubled new tenant David. But the pair may have far more in common than they think.. programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Family, Mystery, Drama ║ 2002 ║ PG
programme.desc: Comedy adventure based on the Hanna-Barbera cartoon, starring Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Linda Cardellini. Two years after a clash of egos caused the disbanding of Mystery Inc, Scooby-Doo and his teen pals are summoned to Spooky Island holiday resort to investigate a series of paranormal incidents. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Decades later, Winton's records of the mission reawaken painful memories of the youngsters he couldn't save - and set him on an unexpected path to laying his ghosts to rest James Hawes - Director Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor.

programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. programme.desc: Halloween lurches into life when a group of youngsters unwittingly unleash all manner of monsters from an RL Stine book. Creepy comedy sequel. (2018)(90 mins).

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: Brilliant family fantasy, which follows a quiet youngster who comes across a mysterious new book that draws him into an incredible, magical world. Flashing images. (1984)(91 mins).

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: Adaptation of the beloved Roald Dahl tale starring Mark Rylance as the lovable giant who befriends a headstrong young orphan. From Steven Spielberg. (2016)(113 mins).

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: The Wizard of Oz meets Motown. Funky overhaul of the evergreen adventure, starring Diana Ross as Dorothy. With Michael Jackson and Richard Pryor. Contains flashing images. (1978)(129 mins).

programme.title: The Wizard Of Oz
programme.desc: Victor Fleming's Oscar-winning classic about a young girl, swept away from her home into the magical land of Oz. With Judy Garland, Ray Bolger and Bert Lahr. (1939)(101 mins).

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Action man Brendan Fraser goes head-to-head with the undead remains of High Priest Imhotep. All-out action with Rachel Weisz. Contains violence and flashing images. (1999).

programme.title: The Curtain Rises On Wicked
programme.desc: Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande reveal their journey into Oz with personal footage from the set and a world-exclusive scene, alongside Wicked cast members including Jeff Goldblum and more.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles:..
programme.desc: The Turtle brothers set out to win over New Yorkers while facing an army of mutants. Animation with Jackie Chan and John Cena. (2023)(96 mins).

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: Brilliant family fantasy, which follows a quiet youngster who comes across a mysterious new book that draws him into an incredible, magical world. Flashing images. (1984)(91 mins).

programme.title: Men In Black
programme.desc: Will Smith joins Tommy Lee Jones for a sci-fi comedy about two secret agents who set out to stop an alien terrorist threatening the planet. (1997).

programme.title: Men In Black II
programme.desc: With the scum of the universe menacing Earth, agent Will Smith brings back Tommy Lee Jones to kick alien backside. Out-of-this-world comic sequel. (2002).

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Check out a fun roundup of the hottest Bollywood tracks that everyone is buzzing about! Discover the tunes that are making waves in the music scene.

programme.title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
programme.desc: Dive into the inspiring life and miracles of the beloved Shirdi saint. Discover his teachings, compassion, and the profound impact he had on countless lives.

programme.title: Chhatriwali
programme.desc: Movie revolves around Sanya, a chemistry genius who decides to use her skills to educate the youth on safe sex and bring about a much-needed social change while looking for a job.

programme.title: Dulhan
programme.desc: Radha, a sweet village girl, struggles to cope with her groom's sudden death. Her life takes a twist when a look-alike, who's married with a daughter, arrives in town.

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra, a wealthy man, falls in love with Priya Bhatia, a real estate agent, as soon as he meets her. When he proposes to her for marriage, he discovers that she is already married.

programme.title: Kishen Kanhaiya
programme.desc: Twin brothers, Kishen and Kanhaiya, are separated at birth and one is raised in a mansion and the other in a poor family. They reunite in a bid to fight evil.

programme.title: Kaho Naa Pyar Hai
programme.desc: (Movies @6) A young girl encounters her deceased boyfriend's doppelganger and seizes the opportunity to uncover the truth behind his murder, leading her on a thrilling quest for justice.

programme.title: Raman Raghav 2.0
programme.desc: Ramanna, a disturbed serial killer, constantly evades the law. However, when he finds a soulmate in Raghavan, the investigating officer of his case, he tries to convince him of how similar they are.

programme.title: Holiday - A Soldier Is Never Off Duty
programme.desc: Virat, a secret Defence Intelligence Agent on vacation in Mumbai, uncovers a terrorist plot after a bus explosion. He races against time to track down the mastermind.

programme.title: Holiday: A Soldier Is Never Off Duty
programme.sub-title: The film won many accolades, at the 1st Star and Style - Lux Awards
programme.desc: Best Film (Boney Kapoor), Best Director (Shekhar Kapur), Best Actor (Anil Kapoor), and Best Actress (Sridevi).

programme.title: Sirf Tum
programme.desc: (1999) Drama starring Sanjay Kapoor, Priya Gill, Sushmita Sen, Kader Khan, Salman Khan, Jackie Shroff and Mohnish Behl. Directed by Ahathian. Produced by Boney Kapoor. Music by Nadeem.

programme.title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
programme.desc: The film is a quirky ride of a reputed contract killer, Babu, and revolves around love, friendship, rivalries, and revenge.

programme.title: Dushman
programme.desc: In a gripping tale, outgoing twin Sonia is murdered by a ruthless killer. Heartbroken, shy twin Naina vows to seek revenge, overcoming her fears with the help of a retired major.

programme.title: Khatarnak
programme.sub-title: Suraj, a charming criminal, falls head over heels for Dr. Sangeeta. She's willing to marry him, but there's a catch
programme.desc: he must turn his life around first.

programme.title: Abhinetri
programme.desc: Shekar and Anjana fall in love and marry, but their relationship falters as Shekar's lab obsession clashes with Anjana's return to dancing. Can they fake harmony for his mom's visit?

programme.title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
programme.desc: (Movies @6) A girl breaks free from the confines of an arranged marriage, choosing to embrace life on her own terms and live passionately, discovering her true self along the way.

programme.title: Kotigobba 3
programme.desc: After succeeding at framing ACP Kishore, Satya goes on to become an international criminal. While he gets targeted by Interpol, Kishore seeks revenge on him too, upon being released from prison.

programme.title: Sanam Teri Kasam
programme.desc: When an awkward librarian gets disowned by her family, she unexpectedly finds support from her mysterious, brooding neighbor, sparking an unlikely friendship-and maybe more.

programme.title: Kya Kool Hain Hum 3
programme.desc: Kanhaiya and Rocky make a living by acting in adult movies in Thailand. Things take a turn when he falls in love with Shalu, and finds it hard to convince her conservative father.

programme.title: Commando - A One Man Army
programme.desc: Karan Dogra, an Indian commando, is on board a plane that crashes in China. He miraculously survives. However, the government labels him a traitor.

programme.title: Jheel Ke Us Paar
programme.desc: Jugnu is determined to marry Sammer, but he's got a scheme to eliminate his visually impaired crush, Neelu. Will his plan succeed, or will love prevail?

programme.title: Prem
programme.desc: Sanjay Verma believes he's reliving a past life as Shantanu after meeting Sonia Verma, his former love. But she's engaged to someone else, complicating his heartfelt quest for connection.

programme.title: Caravan
programme.desc: Sunita flees her dangerous marriage to Rajan, joining a caravan to find help. Amid love and danger, she navigates her feelings for Mohan while evading Rajan's relentless pursuit.

programme.title: Dabangg 2
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Chulbul Pandey, now in Kanpur, tackles rampant crime and exposes villain Baccha Bhaiyaa's dark secrets, showing he's still the fearless 'Dabang' hero everyone loves!

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A group of hijackers takes over a city jail, demanding the release of a ghost. They warn that if their demands aren't met, all criminals will be freed!

programme.title: Laila Majnu
programme.desc: Two lovers, from Kashmir, are unable to unite as they face opposition from their families. However, when fate intervenes, Laila gets married to another guy while Qais goes to London.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Check out a fun roundup of the hottest Bollywood tracks that everyone is buzzing about! Discover the tunes that are making waves in the music scene.

programme.title: Aakhri Raasta
programme.desc: After 24 years behind bars for a crime he didn't commit, David is free but shocked to find his former accusers now thriving as respected citizens in society.

programme.title: Khoobsurat
programme.desc: A quirky romantic finds herself head over heels for a disciplined prince, but their families clash, sparking a hilarious and heartfelt showdown of love and values.

programme.title: Shor
programme.desc: A devoted father lives solely to hear his son speak, but when his dream comes true, he unexpectedly loses his hearing, creating a bittersweet twist in their bond.

programme.title: Gupt
programme.desc: In India, Sahil clashes with his father, Jaisingh, over marriage choices. After a tragic argument leads to Jaisingh's death, Sahil is imprisoned but plots his daring escape.

programme.title: Jabariya Jodi
programme.desc: Abhay, a righteous thug, forcefully kidnaps grooms who demand dowry and later marries them off. Babli, his childhood sweetheart, re-enters his life and changes his priorities.

programme.title: Fukrey Returns
programme.desc: Just out of jail, a don is ready to get back at the four friends who conned her. Star cast- Pulkit Samrat, Richa Chadha, Varun Sharma and Ali Fazal.

programme.title: Siya
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Siya, a brave rape survivor, takes a stand against her captors-powerful men who abused her. Follow her journey of resilience and the fight for justice!

programme.title: Crew
programme.desc: Three cabin crew friends find themselves in a tough spot when an unknown schemer throws a wrench in their plans. Can they uncover the truth and save the day?

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Check out a fun roundup of the hottest Bollywood tracks that everyone is buzzing about! Discover the tunes that are making waves in the music scene.

programme.title: Bobby
programme.desc: Raja, a wealthy businessman's son, falls head over heels for Bobby, a fisherman's daughter. But with their families against their love, will they fight for their happily ever after?

programme.title: Ram Lakhan
programme.desc: After her husband is murdered by greedy relatives, Sharda patiently waits for her sons to rise up and take revenge, hoping to reclaim their family's honor and wealth.

programme.title: Chitchor
programme.desc: Gauri finds herself torn between two charming suitors who arrive in her village, each vying for her affection. Will she follow her heart or choose practicality?

programme.title: Akele Hum Akele Tum
programme.desc: Two aspiring singers, Rohit and Kiran, fall in love and get married. Soon, the burden of responsibilities cripples the marriage and Kiran decides to part ways with Rohit.

programme.title: English Vinglish
programme.desc: A film about a housewife who enrols on an English speaking course to stop her husband and daughter mocking her lack of English skills, gaining self respect in the process.

programme.title: Fukrey 3
programme.desc: (Movies @6) In this hilarious escapade, Fukrey's gang runs a struggling store while navigating Bholi's election campaign. When plans go awry in South Africa, they discover a plot that could change ev.

programme.title: Chandu Champion
programme.desc: A man who faced one adversary after another with an undying spirit. His unwavering zeal and never give up attitude led to India's first individual gold medal in any form of the Olympics.

programme.title: Rockstar
programme.desc: Janardhan Jakhar pursues his rock star dreams and finds love with Heer, navigating the ups and downs of ambition, passion, and the music world along the way.

programme.title: Joggers Park
programme.desc: The story of Jenny, a young, beautiful, vibrant girl and darling to everyone, whose less than perfect romantic past made her mature beyond her years.

programme.title: Turtle
programme.desc: In a drought-hit Rajasthan village, Sanjay Mishra plays Ramkaran, who digs for water while locals engage in a tug of war on his shell, desperate for relief.

programme.title: Awaara

programme.desc: Kajal's in deep trouble with Vishamber on her tail. Little does she know, her bodyguard Karan is actually working for him, with a deadly mission to eliminate her!

programme.title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
programme.desc: In a joint family, tension rises as a mother's dislike for her stepson splits everyone apart. Will she recognize her error, or will this feud tear them apart for good?

programme.title: Aa Ab Laut Chalen

programme.desc: Sunder is head over heels for Radha, but she's not interested. Determined to win her heart, he joins the army and proves himself, returning home ready to propose!

programme.desc: Three harassed female employees fear they have killed their very-much-alive boss and try to dispose of the dead body of an unknown male.

programme.title: Thanksgiving

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. As the Second World War rages, American fashion model-turned-photographer Elizabeth "Lee" Miller defies the expectations of the era and travels to mainland Europe as a war correspondent for Vogue. Reporting from the frontline, Miller captures indelible images of the conflict, including the horrors found in the Nazi concentration camps at Buchenwald and Dachau Ellen Kuras - Director.
